0.title: Abstract Submission Form 2017
0.description:
Use this form to submit your abstract for the Summer Research Symposium. Note: the submission deadline is Thursday, July 13, 2017.

(Note: * indicates a required field.)

fields.label: Coauthors
fields.description:
Your co-authors are those people who contributed to the research you are presenting at the symposium. They are the ones who deserve credit along with you for the advancement in knowledge that your research represents.

  • Enter one name per row in First Last format, e.g. Jordan Smith. Use the (+) symbol to add additional rows.
  • List the names from top to bottom in the same order as they will appear on your poster from left to right.
  • We assume you are the first author, so there is no need to list yourself.
  • Please be sure to include your mentor as appropriate.

fields.label: Class Standing at Start of Fall Semester
Abstract
fields.description: Note: you can use HTML markup tags to denote basic scientific/mathematical formattingMore Info|For example, if you need to enter text in superscript format, as in ex, enter it as <sup>text</sup>. Similarly, if you need to enter text in subscript format, as in MgCl2, enter it as <sub>text</sub>. This HTML-based notation will let us know how to apply the correct formatting your abstract.. If you need extra help with the formatting of your abstract, please contact us at ugresearch@wsu.edu.

0.schedulePendingMessage:
Abstract Submission Form Not Yet Opened

The application for the 2017 Summer Undergraduate Research Symposium will open soon. Please check back later! In the meantime, you can contact UGResearch@wsu.edu with any questions.
0.scheduleMessage:
Abstract Submission Form Now Closed

The application for the 2016 Summer Undergraduate Research Symposium is now closed. The deadline was Monday, July 18, 2016. You can contact UGResearch@wsu.edu if you have any further questions.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message:
Submission Successful

Your abstract has been successfully submitted! We will be sending an email confirmation for your records to your email at {Student Email:6}. Please contact us at ug.research@wsu.edu if you have any questions.

Your Submission

notifications.message: Dear {Faculty Mentor Name:13}: We have received the abstract submission below from {Student Name (First):4.3} {Student Name (Last):4.6} for the Summer Undergraduate Research Symposium. We are sending you this notification for your records. Please contact us at ug.research@wsu.edu if you have any questions. Sincerely, —Shelley Pressley, Ph.D. Director, WSU Office of Undergraduate Research Copy of submission: {all_fields:nohidden}
